SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM num, c.* FROM (SELECT a.id "bbs_id", a.user_id "author_id", TO_CHAR(a.writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')"writedate", a.content "content", '#'||b.hashtag "hashtag", nvl(k."likecount",0)"likecount", nvl(n."commentcount",0)"commentcount",
nvl(m."user_like",0)"user_like"
0"user_like"
FROM bbs a left join vhashtag b ON a.id = b.id left join (select l.bbs_id"BS2",count(l.bbs_id)"likecount" from likebbs l group by l.bbs_id) k ON a.id = k.BS2 left join (select s.bbs_id"BS3",count(s.bbs_id)"commentcount" from comments s group by s.bbs_id) n ON a.id = n.BS3
left join (select o.bbs_id"user_like" from likebbs o where o.user_id=#{user}) m ON a.id = m."user_like"
ORDER BY a.writedate DESC) c) f where num >= #{fpage} and num <= #{epage}
